item.title: Revealing Reveal
item.description: Disclaimer: A limitation of the work that I’m describing in this post is that it may only be useful to sighted persons and is enhanced by being not colorblind. This post discusses a tool that displays code within colored boxes. The current implementation provides titles on the boxes which might be of use to those without (color) vision, but I have not verified it with a screen reader. I will strive in my future work to create tools that are of use to the (color)blind community.
